Help files and manuals weren't included in this package.
You  can  download  them  separately  from  our site  at
  http://www.dream-com.com
(from downloads section)

There are help files in CHM and HLP formats. Manuals are
provided in MS Word 97 format.

If you have any questions  or  comments  please write to
  support@dream-com.com


Dream Company
